node.title: 2025-11-28 Radio Arcane
node.displayName: Dead Of Night & The Dark Market feat. ST4RLIGHT / Decide Today
node.description:
Radio Arcane Presents Dead Of Night & The Dark Market: Black Friday feat. ST4RLIGHT / Decide Today.

The Nightmare continues on Friday, November 28th as Dead Of Night & The Dark Market keep up the monthly grind of dark eclectic music. Come out and help keep the dancefloor barely alive as we celebrate the glum drudgery of our dreadful existence.

This month will feature:

  • ST4RLIGHT (Louisville, KY)
  • Decide Today (Cincinnati, OH)
  • Radio Arcane Dark Music Specialists - Count Grozny, Motuvius Rex
  • Vending by the talented Dark Market.
  • Food - The Gingerbread Hag
  • Drinks by the enchanting Lany StarDust & Smooth T

18+
$8 Advanced tickets
$12 Day of show

About the bands -

ST4AIGHT
“Combining elements of electronic, punk, and indie music, ST4RLIGHT presents an eclectic explosion of sounds that leave audiences wondering “are they ok?” Taking influence from some of the greatest minds in all musical genres such as Coheed and Cambria, Turnstile, Nine Inch Nails, and more, there’s something for everyone in this odd fusion of sounds that most would never dare to combine. Does it sound good? YOU DECIDE”
https://bbmcnoevil.bandcamp.com/album/basement-tapes-1

Decide Today
Decide Today has been the primary project of Robert Inhuman, along with collaborators, following the end of the original Realicide band at the turn of 2011. Sonically it has spanned genres such as industrial, breakcore, darkwave and ambient, while its subject matter maintains focus akin to anarcho-punk and radical hiphop. The project's mission is a contribution to various liberation movements, whether decades ongoing or emerging from the current political climate. Decide Today is based in Cincinnati, has toured Turtle Island (North "America") extensively, as well as many ventures across Europe, South America, and Australia.”
https://decidetoday.bandcamp.com

node.title: 20 : La Procesión de lo Infinitio
node.description: Twentieth episode of Radio Arcane with hosts Brian Drabant, Motuvius Rex and AndrOspore : Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio. We talk a bit about their history, process and life in their home city of Medellín, Colombia. Recorded from home studios as a production of Art Sanctuary in Louisville, KY.
node.shortDescription: Featuring a discussion with South American Gothic Rock Romantics - La Procesión de lo Infinitio.
